subject: Clarification regarding payment adjusted to the Price Index Multiple as applicable on the Reference Index Date during Construction Period as per Clause 23.4 vis-a-vis provisions under Clause 12.3.2 0f MCA of HAM Projects
text: MRalh <cy rTHRf gifera5-ut (Ter qRdev & <THRf HART4,  HRG TRaFT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hra 5a 6i-5 & 6, 7ac7-10, @RQT, #f feqit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ HAM Project/ 2024 Policy Circular No.8.4.47/2024 dated 05th December 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. PROJ-36017(11)/1/2024-NHAI- RO Vijayawada (Comp. No. 248990)} Sub: Clarification regarding Payment adjusted to the Price Index Multiple as applicable on the Reference Index Date during Construction Period as per Clause 23.4 vis-a- vis provisions under Clause 12.3.2 f MCA of HAM Projects.-reg: Executive Committee, NHAI vide its 634th meeting held on 05.10.2024 on Agenda Item No. 634.03 (Copy enclosed at Annexure- I) pertaining to 4-laning of Bethamangala- Baireddypalle Section of Bangalore-Chennai Expressway directed Contract Management Division to examine and Clarify on the Payment of Instalments of Bid Project Cost (BPC) adjusted for the Price Index Multiple (PIM) as applicable on the Reference Index Date preceding the date of achievement of Payment Milestone, in case the Project Milestone is delayed during Construction Period. 2 The matter was examined, not only specific to Concession Agreement of subject Project but also for other HAM Projects based on MCA dated 10.11.2020 and it was found that there is no difference in the provisions of both documents. Accordingly, the following clarifications are provided in the matter: (i) Clause 23.4 (Payment during Construction Period): The Payments for Payment Milestones under this clause are not linked to the achievement of Project Milestones as per Schedule- G during Construction Period till the Scheduled Completion Date: The Payments during the Construction Period are based solely on the achievement of Physical Progress, and the Instalments of the BPC are adjusted for the Price Index Multiple as given in the clause. the Payment Mechanism under Clause 23.4 Operates Independent of the provisions under Clause 12.3.2. (ii) Clause 12.3.2 (Damages for Delay): If the Concessionaire fails to achieve any Project Milestone as per Schedule-G within 90 it is liable to Pay Damages as stipulated in Cl. 12.3.2. 3_ It is to be noted that Physical Progress % given in the Payment Milestones under Cl 23.4 may not match with the Project Milestones given in Schedule-G. This also supports the above Clarification. 4 This Clarification is not applicable to the Projects where Scheduled Completion is delayed: 5_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
